SENT.plain: Behçet's syndrome has to our knowledge not been described hitherto in Greenland Eskimos
A life-threatening case of Behçet's syndrome is described in a 22-year-old female Eskimo
Ulceration and scar formation in the oral and hypopharyngeal cavity were the main clinical manifestations
Treatment with broad-spectrum antibiotics and high-dose prednisone appeared effective
